content: **knitted socks with lace pattern in drops nord size 35 to 43** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no-084 yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** 35/37 - 38/40 - 41/43 foot length 22-24-27 cm leg height down to heel approx 9-9-9 cm **yarn** drops nord from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100-100 g colour 27 light peach **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 mm **knitting gauge** 26 stitches in width and 34 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
